ap-log-server.help: Enable/disable configuring APs or FortiAPs to send log messages to a syslog server (default = disable).
ap-log-server.name: ap-log-server

ap-log-server-ip.help: IP address that APs or FortiAPs send log messages to.
ap-log-server-ip.name: ap-log-server-ip

ap-log-server-port.help: Port that APs or FortiAPs send log messages to.
ap-log-server-port.name: ap-log-server-port

control-message-offload.help: Configure CAPWAP control message data channel offload.
control-message-offload.name: control-message-offload

options.help: WTP, radio, VAP, and STA statistics.
options.name: stats

data-ethernet-II.help: Configure the wireless controller to use Ethernet II or 802.3 frames with 802.3 data tunnel mode (default = enable).
data-ethernet-II.name: data-ethernet-II

options.help: Use Ethernet II frames with 802.3 data tunnel mode.
options.name: enable

options.help: Use 802.3 Ethernet frames with 802.3 data tunnel mode.
options.name: disable

discovery-mc-addr.help: Multicast IP address for AP discovery (default = 244.0.1.140).
discovery-mc-addr.name: discovery-mc-addr

fiapp-eth-type.help: Ethernet type for Fortinet Inter-Access Point Protocol (IAPP), or IEEE 802.11f, packets (0 - 65535, default = 5252).
fiapp-eth-type.name: fiapp-eth-type

image-download.help: Enable/disable WTP image download at join time.
image-download.name: image-download

options.help: Enable WTP image download at join time.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable WTP image download at join time.
options.name: disable

ipsec-base-ip.help: Base IP address for IPsec VPN tunnels between the access points and the wireless controller (default = 169.254.0.1).
ipsec-base-ip.name: ipsec-base-ip

link-aggregation.help: Enable/disable calculating the CAPWAP transmit hash to load balance sessions to link aggregation nodes (default = disable).
link-aggregation.name: link-aggregation

options.help: Enable calculating the CAPWAP transmit hash.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable calculating the CAPWAP transmit hash.
options.name: disable

location.help: Description of the location of the wireless controller.
location.name: location

max-clients.help: Maximum number of clients that can connect simultaneously (default = 0, meaning no limitation).
max-clients.name: max-clients

max-retransmit.help: Maximum number of tunnel packet retransmissions (0 - 64, default = 3).
max-retransmit.name: max-retransmit

mesh-eth-type.help: Mesh Ethernet identifier included in backhaul packets (0 - 65535, default = 8755).
mesh-eth-type.name: mesh-eth-type

rogue-scan-mac-adjacency.help: Maximum numerical difference between an AP's Ethernet and wireless MAC values to match for rogue detection (0 - 31, default = 7).
rogue-scan-mac-adjacency.name: rogue-scan-mac-adjacency

wtp-share.help: Enable/disable sharing of WTPs between VDOMs.
wtp-share.name: wtp-share

options.help: WTP can be shared between all VDOMs.
options.name: enable

options.help: WTP can be used only in its own VDOM.
options.name: disable
